Onsite Banker Plus

StarID

StarID security tokens

Enhance the security of your online banking transactions with a StarID security token! Why should your business use a StarID security token?

StarID strengthens the security of your Wire Transfer and ACH transactions. With StarID you can ensure that you have robust protection against unauthorized access, even if your User ID and Password have been compromised.

How do StarID security tokens work?

StarID security tokens are for Onsite Banker Plus users who utilize Wire Transfer or ACH/Tax modules. Once enabled, this easy to use process adds an additional level of authentication security to transaction initiation and approval processes. A rotating security code is displayed on the token and the user is prompted to enter that code to proceed with the transaction.

How do I register?

Contact your local Westamerica Community Banker to get registered for your StarID security token. Once you receive your token, simply log into your Onsite Banker Plus account. Select the Admin menu, click Active Token and follow the easy prompts.

Call your local branch or (800) 829-8629 with questions.
